programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o clear.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
gaReverb init 0
instr 1
idur = p3 kpitch = p4 a1 diskin2 "fox.wav", kpitch a1 = a1*.5 ;reduce volume vincr gaReverb, a1 endin
instr 99 ; global reverb al, ar reverbsc gaReverb, gaReverb, .8, 10000 outs gaReverb+al, gaReverb+ar
clear gaReverb
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i1 0 3 1 i99 0 5 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
